resources.string: RestaurantFinder is an open source Android application that picks a restaurant for you based on your location. The source code can be found below.
(Optional) Enter any filter, e.g. vegetarian, bbq, sushi
You don\'t have any restaurants saved.
"Location has not been found yet. Please try again. Acquiring GPS signal may take up to a minute on some devices."
Please enter a valid address, city, zip code, or use GPS by clicking the icon.
No restaurants found at this location, please enter a different location.
Connection timed out, check your internet connection and try again.
No network connection, please turn on your network.
Location permission are required to use GPS.
Location permissions have been denied. Please enable them manually in settings.
Location permissions denied. Please enter location manually.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
